header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 195-55r15 drivers

Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 195-55r15 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 195/55R15 Tire Size
195/55R15 tires are a smaller size that’s typically found on compacts, coupes, and sedans. If you drive a Chevrolet Spark EV, Honda Fit Sport, Hyundai Accent GLS, Kia Rio, Mazda or Protege, you might have 195/55R15 tires. Did you buy a brand new version of any of these vehicles? If that’s the case, your ride might’ve come with a set of Bridgestone Ecopia EP150, Dunlop SP 31, Kumho Solus KH16, or [Bridgestone Potenza RE92](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/potenza-re92) tires attached.

Popular vehicles
2014-2016 Chevrolet Spark EV
2007-2008 Honda Fit Sport
2006-2011 Hyundai Accent GLS
2001-2011 Kia Rio
2001-2003 Mazda Protege

Most drivers only use one set of tires, so finding something that performs in dry, wet, and light winter weather becomes a must. Fortunately, all-season tires are designed to give drivers the year-round traction that they crave. Consider the Falken Sincera SN250 A/S, [Hankook Ventus V2 Concept2 (H457)](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/ventus-v2-concept2-h457), or Primewell Valera Sport AS if you want a set of 195/55R15 tires that offer strong performance year-round.

While all-season tires are great year-round, they might struggle with heavy ice, slush, and snow. Fortunately, winter tires are engineered to give drives consistent traction and performance in these conditions so take a look at the [Pirelli Cinturato Winter](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/cinturato-winter), Continental VikingContact 7, or Nexen Winguard Winspike WH62  if you need extra grip in winter weather.

Maybe you want something a little bit sportier for your Honda Fit Sport. Ultra-high-performance tires are designed to give drivers quicker acceleration and better grip for tight turns at higher speeds. Consider the [Yokohama Advan Fleva V701](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/advan-fleva-v701), Kumho Ecsta PS31, or GT Radial Champiro UHP A/S to bring out the sportier side of your ride.

Whether you drive a Chevrolet Spark EV, Honda Fit Sport, Kia Rio, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 195/55R15 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
